question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "How have you been treated by the police in America?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Quite nicely.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I personally never had any bad experience with police in the America.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "But I also understand that\u2019s largely due to", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I\u2019m a woman", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I\u2019m Asian", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "My relatively benign experience is NOT counter-evidence against systemic racism in the police force.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The thing is, the majority of people do not experience police brutality. But then again, \u201cdo not beat up or kill innocent people\u201d is the bare minimum for any citizen, let alone a police officer, who should, you know, \u201cprotect and serve\u201d.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "OK, say, water. we all drink them, the city provides it, we pay for the water pipes and such with our tax money. But occasionally, some people get serious sickness and die because of bacteria in water.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Do you think it is reasonable to say \u201cwell, the majority of people have no problem with water, I don\u2019t know why this city\u2019s water services get a bad rap just because a few people died because of drinking water? I don\u2019t understand why are people so angry. So a few of them got seriously ill and died because water service people aren\u2019t careful. And a few of them got seriously ill and died because some water service employees literally poison the water\u2026 I have been drinking from the faucet all my life, never had any problem at all.\u201d", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Your personal experience does not negate systemic problems. And YOU putting your personal experience out there and defend an oppressive system, that makes you part of the problem. You\u2019re basically saying \u201cbecause I don\u2019t feel oppressed, it does not exist\u201d.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "You know what that called?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "It\u2019s called privilege.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Yes yes, you\u2019re black, you\u2019re brown, you\u2019re male, you fit the profile.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Never experience racism, ever. What is racism, LOL?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "You got lucky.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "It\u2019s like those white women who believe they don\u2019t need feminism.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Great, I really hope all you \u201coppression doesn\u2019t exist because it doesn\u2019t impact me\u201d people continue to be lucky.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
